title: Manohari Mayura Haaram Set: Diamond Peacock Long Necklace with Jhumkas
materials: 22K Gold base with Hyderabadi Polish. Features brilliant-cut diamonds of VS clarity
interspersed with natural emeralds and rubies. Adorned with South Sea pearls.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a classic peacock (Mayura) design, a symbol of beauty and grace. The intricate filigree work and pave setting of the diamonds highlight the detailed craftsmanship. The central ruby and emerald accents add a touch of traditional color. Matching Jhumkas echo the peacock motif and pearl drops for a cohesive look. Nakshi work detailing is evident in the peacock's feathers.
colors: complemented by the rich red of the rubies and the vibrant green of the emeralds. The pearls add a soft
occasions: and Muhurtham. A statement piece for any special occasion.
description: This Manohari Mayura Haaram is a testament to timeless South Indian elegance. The superior diamond quality, intricate craftsmanship, and symbolic peacock design make it a valuable heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures lasting shine and durability. This set will not only enhance your beauty but also reflect your appreciation for tradition and artistry.
